languages.text: "Эх, если бы они затаились по углам и научились хоть как-то выживать... Глядишь, появился бы и с ними хладный торг".
"If they had holed up in some dark corner and figured out a way to survive, I'm sure some enterprising soul would have brought them into the Cold Trade by now."
languages.original_text: "Эх, если бы они затаились по углам и научились хоть как-то выживать... Глядишь, появился бы и с ними хладный торг".

traits.locale_text: "If they had holed up in some dark corner and figured out a way to survive, I'm sure some enterprising soul would have brought them into the Cold Trade by now."
"If they had holed up in some dark corner and figured out a way to survive, I'm sure some enterprising soul would have brought them into the Cold Trade by now."
"If they had holed up in some dark corner and figured out a way to survive, I'm sure some enterprising soul would have brought them into the Cold Trade by now."
"If they had holed up in some dark corner and figured out a way to survive, I'm sure some enterprising soul would have brought them into the Cold Trade by now."

languages.text: “如果他们当初躲在某个阴暗的角落里，想办法求生的话，那我敢肯定，他们现在应该已经被某些大胆的家伙拉去搞冷市贸易了。”
languages.original_text: "If they had holed up in some dark corner and figured out a way to survive, I'm sure some enterprising soul would have brought them into the Cold Trade by now."

traits.locale_text: “如果他们当初躲在某个阴暗的角落里，想办法求生的话，那我敢肯定，他们现在应该已经被某些大胆的家伙拉去搞冷市贸易了。”

languages.text: « S'ils s'étaient planqués le temps d'assurer leur survie, je suis sûre que quelqu'un aurait trouvé un moyen de les impliquer dans le Commerce Froid. »
languages.original_text: "If they had holed up in some dark corner and figured out a way to survive, I'm sure some enterprising soul would have brought them into the Cold Trade by now."

traits.locale_text: « S'ils s'étaient planqués le temps d'assurer leur survie, je suis sûre que quelqu'un aurait trouvé un moyen de les impliquer dans le Commerce Froid. »

languages.text: «Si se hubieran escondido en un rincón oscuro y buscado el modo de sobrevivir, seguro que algún emprendedor los habría llevado ya al Comercio Frío».
languages.original_text: "If they had holed up in some dark corner and figured out a way to survive, I'm sure some enterprising soul would have brought them into the Cold Trade by now."

traits.locale_text: «Si se hubieran escondido en un rincón oscuro y buscado el modo de sobrevivir, seguro que algún emprendedor los habría llevado ya al Comercio Frío».

languages.text: 「もし彼らがどこかの暗い一角に引きこもって生き残る方法を見つけ出してたなら、きっと今頃、進取の気性に富んだ誰かが彼らを冷たき取引に引き入れたことだろうね」
languages.original_text: "If they had holed up in some dark corner and figured out a way to survive, I'm sure some enterprising soul would have brought them into the Cold Trade by now."

traits.locale_text: 「もし彼らがどこかの暗い一角に引きこもって生き残る方法を見つけ出してたなら、きっと今頃、進取の気性に富んだ誰かが彼らを冷たき取引に引き入れたことだろうね」

languages.text: "Hätten sie sich in irgendeiner dunklen Ecke verkrochen und einen Weg gefunden, zu überleben, ich bin mir sicher, irgendeine geschäftstüchtige Seele hätte sie längst zum Kalthandel gebracht."
languages.original_text: "If they had holed up in some dark corner and figured out a way to survive, I'm sure some enterprising soul would have brought them into the Cold Trade by now."

traits.locale_text: "Hätten sie sich in irgendeiner dunklen Ecke verkrochen und einen Weg gefunden, zu überleben, ich bin mir sicher, irgendeine geschäftstüchtige Seele hätte sie längst zum Kalthandel gebracht."

languages.original_text: "If they had holed up in some dark corner and figured out a way to survive, I'm sure some enterprising soul would have brought them into the Cold Trade by now."

languages.text: "Karanlık bir köşeye sığınıp hayatta kalmanın bir yolunu bulmuş olsalar... Girişimci biri çoktan onları Soğuk Ticaret'e sokardı."
languages.original_text: "If they had holed up in some dark corner and figured out a way to survive, I'm sure some enterprising soul would have brought them into the Cold Trade by now."

traits.locale_text: "Karanlık bir köşeye sığınıp hayatta kalmanın bir yolunu bulmuş olsalar girişimci biri çoktan onları Soğuk Ticaret'e sokmuş olurdu."
